abstract.p: We compute all irregular primes less than 163 577 856. For all of these primes we verify that the Kummer—Vandiver conjecture holds and that the λ-invariant is equal to the index of irregularity.

ref.label: BCE01
ref.mixed-citation: J. Buhler, R. Crandall, R. Ernvall, T. Metsankyla, and M. Shokrollahi, Irregular primes and cyclotomic invariants to 12 million, J. Symbolic Comput. 31 (2001), no. 1-2, 89-96, Computational algebra and number theory (Milwaukee, WI, 1996). MR1806208 (2001m:11220)
